channel.title: InvasionX - The Ultimate Gaming Experience
channel.description:
[B][CENTER] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14o3kgm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://frostblades.org/ad/divider.png[/img]
Website: http://invasionx.co.uk Forums: [url=http://invasionx.co.uk/Forums]http://invasionx.co.uk/Forums[/url] Download: [url=http://invasionx.co.uk/InvasionX.jar]http://invasionx.co.uk/InvasionX.jar[/url] Webclient: [url=http://invasionx.co.uk/Play%20Now/]http://invasionx.co.uk/Play%20Now/[/url] Vote4Rewards: [url=http://invasionx.co.uk/Vote/]http://invasionx.co.uk/Vote/[/url] Donate: [url=http://invasionx.co.uk/Donate/]http://invasionx.co.uk/Donate/[/url]
[IMG]http://frostblades.org/ad/divider.png[/img]
InvasionX is a unique server. We offer most of Runescape's current content, skills and places. We offer you 10+ bosses, Fight Caves and mini-games like the ones you already love. We have a great economy, an active and helpful staff, and an active form. Playing InvasionX is just like playing the game on original Runescape, therefore, we needed to set ourselves aside - by means of faster XP rate to help you enjoy the game and faster money making.
Features:
We are currently 718 Loading 747! We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a good' pvp system, Loyalty programme, many minigames, custom bosses and much more!
PvP/Pking:
- We have a refined Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Good Switching - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
PvM:
- King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - All other God-wars bosses! - Duel arena - Castle Wars
PvP And PvM:
[color=green]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Skills:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]- Attack - Strength - Defence - Ranged - Magic - RuneCrafting - Constitution - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - FireMaking - WoodCutting - Farming - Summoning - Construction - Custom Dungeoneering[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Monsters:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]- TzTok-Jad - Haar'Aken - WildyWyem - Ice Strykewyrm - Glacors - Kalphite Queen - Kree'Arra - Nex - General Graardor - Commander Zilyana - K'ril Tsutsaroth - Frost Dragons - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Deamons - Queen Black Dragon - YkLagor And Some More...[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Minigames:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]- Barrows - Castle Wars - Dominion Tower - Duel Arena - Fight Kiln - Fight Pits - The Crucible - Warriors guild - Soul Wars - Tzhaar Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Pest Control - Clan Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Others:[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow] - Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained by Killing Frost Dragons. - More Auras - Decanting - Fixed Shops - Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses. - Full Quick Chat - All Spells in the ancients Spell book - Trading - Dicing - Curses & Prayers - Perfect combat, 100% flawless - Armour set effects all added - Flawless Music & Sound system - Full Completionists cape - Tutorial Island (70% Done) - Grotworm Lair - Chaos Dwarf Battlefield[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Project Team: Kenn aka Ream (Server Coder) Aust1n (Server Coder) Razzy (Graphics Designer)
Credits: Aust1n Kenn Matrix Team Thomas [/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/Razzy/"]Razzy[/URL] has been promoted to [IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/static/avatar/design.gif[/img]Graphics Designer.
[IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/login_zpsd573f9d0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/poly_zps83766c92.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/sara_zps765d95ec.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i430/clawzownu/warriors_zpsf94cc06b.png[/img]

item.title: InvasionX - The Ultimate Gaming Experience
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You’re welcome?

[hr]
[hr]
[hr]

[B][CENTER]

Website: http://invasionx.co.uk
Forums: http://invasionx.co.uk/Forums
Download: http://invasionx.co.uk/InvasionX.jar
Webclient: http://invasionx.co.uk/Play%20Now/
Vote4Rewards: http://invasionx.co.uk/Vote/
Donate: http://invasionx.co.uk/Donate/

InvasionX is a unique server. We offer most of Runescape’s current content, skills and places. We offer you 10+ bosses, Fight Caves and mini-games like the ones you already love. We have a great economy, an active and helpful staff, and an active form. Playing InvasionX is just like playing the game on original Runescape, therefore, we needed to set ourselves aside - by means of faster XP rate to help you enjoy the game and faster money making.

Features:

We are currently 718 Loading 747!
We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a good’ pvp system, Loyalty programme, many minigames, custom bosses and much more!

PvP/Pking:

  • We have a refined Pvp sysem
  • We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking
  • Good Switching
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP

PvM:

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Close to 100% Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows
  • All other God-wars bosses!
  • Duel arena
  • Castle Wars

PvP And PvM:

[color=green]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless

  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=green]Skills:[/COLOR]

[COLOR=yellow]- Attack

  • Strength
  • Defence
  • Ranged
  • Magic
  • RuneCrafting
  • Constitution
  • Agility
  • Herblore
  • Thieving
  • Crafting
  • Fletching
  • Slayer
  • Hunter
  • Mining
  • Smithing
  • Fishing
  • Cooking
  • FireMaking
  • WoodCutting
  • Farming
  • Summoning
  • Construction
  • Custom Dungeoneering[/COLOR]

[COLOR=green]Monsters:[/COLOR]

[COLOR=yellow]- TzTok-Jad

  • Haar’Aken
  • WildyWyem
  • Ice Strykewyrm
  • Glacors
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Kree’Arra
  • Nex
  • General Graardor
  • Commander Zilyana
  • K’ril Tsutsaroth
  • Frost Dragons
  • King Black Dragon
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Tormented Deamons
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • YkLagor
    And Some More…[/COLOR]

[COLOR=green]Minigames:[/COLOR]

[COLOR=yellow]- Barrows

  • Castle Wars
  • Dominion Tower
  • Duel Arena
  • Fight Kiln
  • Fight Pits
  • The Crucible
  • Warriors guild
  • Soul Wars
  • Tzhaar Fight Caves
  • Fight Pits
  • Pest Control
  • Clan Wars[/COLOR]

[COLOR=green]Others:[/COLOR]

[COLOR=yellow]

  • Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained by Killing Frost Dragons.
  • More Auras
  • Decanting
  • Fixed Shops
  • Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses.
  • Full Quick Chat
  • All Spells in the ancients Spell book
  • Trading
  • Dicing
  • Curses & Prayers
  • Perfect combat, 100% flawless
  • Armour set effects all added
  • Flawless Music & Sound system
  • Full Completionists cape
  • Tutorial Island (70% Done)
  • Grotworm Lair
  • Chaos Dwarf Battlefield[/COLOR]

[COLOR=red]Project Team:
Kenn aka Ream (Server Coder)
Aust1n (Server Coder)
Razzy (Graphics Designer)

Credits:
Aust1n
Kenn
Matrix Team
Thomas
[/COLOR]
Razzy has been promoted to Graphics Designer.

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
